tool_description: Manages domain renewals by checking expiration dates, processing renewals, and updating renewal settings for single domains or bulk operations.

domain_names.description: List of domain names to manage renewals for

action.description: Action to perform: check, renew, update_settings, or bulk_renew

renewal_years.description: Number of years to renew domains (1-10)

notification_days.description: Days before expiration to send notifications (7-365)

force_renewal.description: Force renewal even if domain is not close to expiration

error_messages: Invalid domain format: One or more domain names are not valid.
Invalid action: Action must be one of: check, renew, update_settings, bulk_renew.
Renewal years out of range: Renewal period must be between 1 and 10 years.
Domain not found: One or more domains are not registered or not managed by the current registrar.
Payment failed: Renewal payment could not be processed.
Notification days out of range: Notification period must be between 7 and 365 days.
Bulk operation limit exceeded: Maximum 100 domains can be processed in a single request.
usage: Provide domain names and the action to perform. For renewals, specify renewal_years. Use update_settings to modify auto-renewal and notification preferences. The tool processes renewals and returns status for each domain.

total_cost.description: Total cost for all renewals processed

failed_domains.description: Domains that failed to process with error reasons

next_expiration_dates.description: Updated expiration dates for renewed domains
